analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LambdaLock.claim (/unique_contracts/0xf8d03ea2ae3ec511516736560225eca17042f657.sol#244-269):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(LambdaToken.transfer(msg.sender,amount)) (/unique_contracts/0xf8d03ea2ae3ec511516736560225eca17042f657.sol#255-258)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- beneficiaryClaims (/unique_contracts/0xf8d03ea2ae3ec511516736560225eca17042f657.sol#259)

LambdaLock.claim (/unique_contracts/0xf8d03ea2ae3ec511516736560225eca17042f657.sol#244-269) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- cur_claim.delay.add(genesisTime) < block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0xf8d03ea2ae3ec511516736560225eca17042f657.sol#249-267)

LambdaLock.ONE_MONTHS should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xf8d03ea2ae3ec511516736560225eca17042f657.sol#231-233)
LambdaLock.genesisTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xf8d03ea2ae3ec511516736560225eca17042f657.sol#225-226)
